name: Bathroom Break!
description:
It's frog dissection day in Biology class...
If I see one more dead frog body, I'm... I'm going to...
Oh god... No... NOOOOOO
#BathroomBreak

How high of a Vomit Score can you get?! Show us!!

It’s a mad dash from the biology lab to the bathroom as you take down everyone and everything in your way! Rack up points as you barf on bullies and bystanders. But don’t get caught with an empty stomach when paper airplanes and basketballs come your way!
